message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to own it, and I'm willing to start with a price of $12,000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

I understand you're interested in the product, Bob, but $8,000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering it to you for $10,000. This is my best price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $10,000. I'm willing to meet you at $9,000. Would you consider this price?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but $9,000 is still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm offering the product to you for $10,500. This is my final offer, and I'm confident it's a fair price for the value this product brings.
I understand you're trying to get the best price, but I'm still not comfortable with $10,500. I'm willing to meet you at $9,500. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can agree on a price.

I'm a bit surprised you're still willing to negotiate, Bob, but I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm offering the product to you for $11,000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I'm hoping we can finally agree on a price.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $9,000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can agree on a price.

I'm starting to think we're not going to agree on a price, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm offering the product to you for $11,500. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and if you're still not interested, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate the time we've spent negotiating, but I'm not willing to pay more than $9,000. I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price. My final offer is $9,000.
